rooms.description: You are currently in a Dungeon Hallway. The room is dark and there is a flashlight on the ground. You see a light at the end of the hallway leading to the second room, which is north. You can either take flashlight or go north.
You are currently in the Dungeon's kitchen. There is a knife on the table, and you see something moving by the window.
You are currently in the bathroom.
